website_summaries.verdict: Foam climber set that also includes big blocks that are fun to stack.
pros: Set includes 2 building blocks as well as a ramp that toddlers can climb and slide down
Vinyl covering is soft and easy to clean
Toddlers have lots of fun building and stacking the blocks
cons: The pieces do not have Velcro to attach them together

customer_reviews.title: WORTH THE MONEY!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I know it seems expensive but these are a great buy for your money! Played with EVERY DAY! Our one year old climbs on them, carries them around, jumps off of them, and loves them stacked up to knock down!!!! Whether you create a slide, a tunnel, a wall, or climbing place they are a bit hit from out 1 year old to our 5 year old! THEY LOVE THEM!
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a 1-year old to play!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this two months ago and our son is going to be one this month. He is a climber and these have helped burn off energy for him. He loves to slide down the angled one! They will probably get another 1-2 years of constant use. I love that they are big enough for him to climb all over and pretty easy to store in a corner when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: gr8koogly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for babies/toddlers
customer_reviews.text: I love Gymboree classes, but unfortunately we don't live near a facility. These are a great option to have your own fun at home! Our daughter loves crawling on and over them. Very easy to clean up, just wipe down with a damp cloth. I think we may buy double sided velcro to adhere the pieces together. These are hands down the least expensive option out there, and definitely worth it. Note the sizing, they are probably best for a child <5 years old. Our daughter has been using them almost everyday since she's 9 months old and they are still in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gross motor activity for indoors or outdoors!
customer_reviews.text: These are great climbers for a crawling baby and toddlers. I do not put them together because they slide apart, I lay them out separately and sort of have an obstacle course or put one out per day and because they are all different shapes it is a different experience each day. The preschoolers use these form too! they stand and balance on the curved form, use the triangle as a car ramp and put all the forms together to build structures and forts. Endless opportunities with this product, well made easy to clean, and well worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Susi Key

customer_reviews.title: What I love most about this product is that my one year ...
customer_reviews.text: What I love most about this product is that my one year old loves it.. He was born with Spina Bifida and currently not walking. This product is teaching him how to use his legs more and learning to become mobile while learning crawling. Hopefully, i would be able to try more products for him as he grows.. Thanks Constructive Playthings..
customer_reviews.author: Kennytta S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect playroom addition
customer_reviews.text: We've had these blocks for a few years now and they hold up very well. My kids have done just about everything to these blocks including kicking, punching, jumping. The only sign that they are not brand new are the pen marks my daughter put on one of them. I highly recommend for any parent with young kids.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth P.

customer_reviews.title: Key ingredient to pre-toddler obstacle courses
customer_reviews.text: They do seem a bit small, but our 10-mo-old pushes the wedge around like a drink-cart for inflight-service on airlines that still appreciate customers. It's really quite comical. I'm not certain when he'll outgrow them. He currently uses them in his self-styled obstacle course fueled both by short attention-span and a toddler's viewpoint that all things should be climbed, pushed, tasted.
customer_reviews.author: Allan Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great for little climbers! Will be buying more!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my nieces first birthday, since she was already walking and climbing. She absolutely loves these!!! She constantly drags them around the house and and builds little structure with the to play on. I will be buying her a bigger set for Christmas to add to these. The a great for older children as well. At her birthday party there were older kids (about 5-8) and they all played on them as well. It was definitely a crowd pleaser.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna Medina

customer_reviews.title: So far, worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I understand these are expensive and we took a gamble not knowing if our son would ever even be interested in them (he's only 7.5 months right now) but they were recommended by some early-childhood development friends. Even though he isn't strong enough to climb up them himself, we interact with them daily. He beats on them, uses them to help stand, "slides" down the yellow slanted one, knocks down towers, etc. I actually think he will really like them when he can jump/crawl/stomp all over them. They seem very durable, easy to clean and make me wish we had more space to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: P&B C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for little ones. Durable.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Exactly what I expected. We got these for our 1 year old, but our 5 and 7 year old repeatedly put them through the wringer as they throw them around,climb on them and build with them. They are definitely well made and durable. Our 1 year old loves them too. She enjoys climbing on them and pushing them around.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Just Add Climbers!
customer_reviews.text: These are HIGH QUALITY playthings! A bit pricey, but they are going to last forever! It is a FAVORITE for all the little ones that come to visit!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S. Mcdonald

customer_reviews.title: High quality, variety of uses, can find uses from age 0 - 40+
customer_reviews.text: This is great for creative play and very sturdy. We have owned 2 sets for 5 years, played by 2 of the roughest boys and their friends and still no damage. The soft blocks are fun to throw around, yet won't cause damage to your walls and body parts if the aim is off :) It is one of my "go-to" gifts for our close friends...kind of pricey but once you see how many different ways the kids will play with them, and how many years they will play with them it becomes worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Seattle gal

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I just love it!! The material seems to be very durable, size is perfect for my two years old daughter and by the way she loves it more than I do... I think is the best purchase I made ever 😄. You won’t regret it...
customer_reviews.author: Jorgelina Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Son has fun on them just about everyday
customer_reviews.text: My 10 month old son loves these blocks they’ve helped him learn how to climb down off of things. My only complaint is they seem a bit expensive for just 5 pieces. Hopefully he will play with them for few years.
customer_reviews.author: JaRae Miller

customer_reviews.title: The only thing my son won't climb
customer_reviews.text: I have a 10 month old boy who loves to climb everything, except of course, these blocks. Sure, I can get a giggle out of him if I build a tunnel and crawl through, and they are great for building forts... but they take up a lot of space and I was hoping for far more than a few giggles.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: These are a favorite. They are well made and the foam is ...
customer_reviews.text: These are a favorite. They are well made and the foam is not too hard or soft....just right.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, durable enough to stand up to my ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, durable enough to stand up to my little tonka truck! He loves them. Climbed on, picked up, knocked over! Super fun! Super glad i bit the bullet because its more than i thought i wanted to pay. However, my son's clothes were maybe 20 bucks, the blocks, well a little hefty for my pocket but the look on his face...priceless. melts my heart to see my baby boy so dang entertained & happy. Hes a year & 3 months so I'm sure we'll definitely get our monies worth!!
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: My 14 month old has a field day with these. He stacks them and uses them to climb to what he really seeks at any given moment. They are well built, and easy to clean. How can you go wrong?
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great for toddler that loves to climb!! my one year old absolutely loves playing and bulldozing over them...
customer_reviews.author: Jayme

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My 1yo grandson is in constant motion and absolutely loves climbing all over these
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Salmons

customer_reviews.title: Ok to climb on but no wa to attach
customer_reviews.text: These are way more expensive than they are worth. My daughter likes climbing on them but when she transitions from one piece to the next she falls through because there is no way to attach the pieces to each other. It’s a bit of a disappointing for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: jlf5009

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase! Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: We bought these as a Christmas present for our 9 month old. Very happy with our purchase! Our little one loves to crawl all over them and he is learning balance in the process. Even our 4 year old loves these!
customer_reviews.author: Trojans17goto

customer_reviews.title: Soft play forms great for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: I bought the soft play foams for my one-year old grandson's birthday because he loves to climb on things. They are fantastic and I think playing on them has helped his balance. He is just starting to walk and he does a lot of toppling over. His three-year-old brother also likes to play on them and each day finds new uses for them in his creative play--stacking them to make a tower, making them "roads" to run his cars on, etc. They are sturdy, yet soft enough that no injuries result when the occasional tower falls down on his brother. I think nearly all toddlers would love these play forms!
customer_reviews.author: jeanneb

customer_reviews.title: So well made!  Grandson's favorite Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: This was by far my grandson's favorite Christmas gift. They are so well made and he will use them for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Smgar

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to do exercise for my baby he is a special-needs and is very firm super comfortable great colors and help for lots of exercise
customer_reviews.author: Lesly

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the best purchases I have made and would recommend for any ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my 10 month old grandson. He is constantly climbing, pushing and tumbling over them. The round one he picks up and carries all over. This is one of the best purchases I have made and would recommend for any child for balance and fun!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have a 15 months old and a 3 year old that love to climb
customer_reviews.text: These are well made and have help up very well with the first 6 months in our home. I have a 15 months old and a 3 year old that love to climb, build and flop these around. Totally worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Watson

customer_reviews.title: but perfect for him
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my grand son's 1st birthday. Two month's later and he still likes to climb them daily. They are a bit smaller than I expected, but perfect for him. They are sturdy and well made. I'm sure they will last him for years. They're expensive, but I think if you figure in that he'll be able to use them for many years, it makes them well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweight so kids can configure it themselves.
customer_reviews.text: This was a huge hit. My grandson loves it. He builds a tower and runs into it with his Thomas the Train engine from the roller coaster to make it crash. He also uses it as part of an obstacle course.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Wiersum

customer_reviews.title: she fell in love with each piece and began to immediately set the ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a very active toddler who loves to tumble. The minute she opened this product, she fell in love with each piece and began to immediately set the blocks in different configurations and began her tumbling etc.. The construction of each piece is superior and easily cleaned. The hours that have been spent playing with the product, just since Christmas is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Beth B. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Much smaller than advertised
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than advertised. Definitely not worth the expensive price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great climbing toy for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. Only wish it had Velcro on each piece to keep them together when u make different climbing shapes they don't stay together easy. Guess I will try and buy some Velcro and try it. Planning on buying another set for my other grandson for x mas
customer_reviews.author: CigarbobNJ

customer_reviews.title: just great. a bit of money
customer_reviews.text: just great. a bit of money, but for all the use they have gotten, the cheapest toy i have bought. i agree with all the other positive reviews. the blocks are plenty big - as big as the pictures suggest. we have had these for two years now - no damage and easy to clean. unlimited uses as other reviewers have noted, some i never imagined - my 3 year old spent an hour pushing one around with his butt the other day... me: what are you doing? son: i am the tail.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun For Hours
customer_reviews.text: Once it was opened at Christmas the 3 and 1 year old girls loved crawling over these through the 6' tunnel. It's now setup in the play area with the tunnel and they really enjoy them for hours at a time. Was concerned they would play with them once and be done, but no concern now.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy B

customer_reviews.title: Soft Play Forms are Winners
customer_reviews.text: Very functional, durable products. They're soft yet solid. Even our one year old grandson loves to play with them and on them. It appears the soft play forms will provide several more years of enjoyment. And they're easy to store and stack. They're winners!
customer_reviews.author: Gee Whiz

customer_reviews.title: Easily cleaned, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Easily cleaned, sturdy. A bit expensive for what they are, but you know what you're getting into when you click the buy button.
customer_reviews.author: C.J.

customer_reviews.title: Good for all the family!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I saw them at a friend's place and I knew they grow with the child. My boy is 6months old and he already found so many ways to play and excercise with them. As a bonus my husband and I found that they are great to stretch, even better than the roll we used.
customer_reviews.author: Soledad

customer_reviews.title: This is a great starter set for crawlers and toddlers
customer_reviews.text: This is a great starter set for crawlers and toddlers, my twin boys love it. Best of all I can wipe it down with a soapy cloth and the pieces are individual so I can store it under the ottoman when not in use!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great product and great value! I wasn't sure how these would be since they're half the price of competitiors, but they're great. My son is tough with his toys and these haven't ripped. He loves climbing on and over them
customer_reviews.author: Taryn

customer_reviews.title: Solid quality
customer_reviews.text: Love. Great quality. And, surprising bonus, I find myself sitting on them all the time when down on the ground playing with the kids. They're built for weight that's for sure! Haha.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Jones

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy; No Velcro
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Just wish it has the Velcro sides to stick the pieces together. The Amazon brand has that so I may return these and get the Amazon brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and durable!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 mo loves these play things and they are high quality and well worth the price. Very durable and cushion enough for practicing climbing and walking/falling down!
customer_reviews.author: Missbrandi

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, we have only had it for a few months but there have not been any issues so far. Out 9 month old son loves them and climbs all over them. When he has a piece in the living room on the hard wood floors then he pushes it ll around the house. For the price I would not think twice about buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: nate moore

customer_reviews.title: Just plain fun
customer_reviews.text: This is a good toy even for my big four yr old and small two yr old. It is fun coming up with different ways to climb and slide and balance on these blocks. We are loving them! One small setback is that they are a little slippery, but the kids do not seem to mind
customer_reviews.author: sassfaewen

customer_reviews.title: The best toy. My 14 month old climbs the ramp ...
customer_reviews.text: The best toy. My 14 month old climbs the ramp and sits on the square block as a little perch 😍. Easy to clean and pretty durable!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Thomas

customer_reviews.title: he plays well with these and also use them to sit or slide down and watch his favorite shows.
customer_reviews.text: At first it seemed dangerous for my son to climb on top and he would use this as a way to reach things that he shouldn't. Now that he is almost 2, he plays well with these and also use them to sit or slide down and watch his favorite shows.
customer_reviews.author: ERNIE LEWIS

customer_reviews.title: Best long lasting gift so far.
customer_reviews.text: We got these as a gift TEN years ago when my son was one and was desperate to climb on everything. He is now 11 and still uses them every few days to watch movies or set up forts in the living room for his Nerf battles. By far this is the best gift he ever got.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: SMALL!!!  These are basically large blocks
customer_reviews.text: These are not at all like the picture. They are very small. My 1 yr old didn't even want to climb on them. I feel a little ripped off as well with the shipping cost. Next time I will search for Prime only. I ended up getting another set that was larger, no additional shipping cost and my son loves them. The brand I ended up with is foamnasium.
customer_reviews.author: Susanne K

customer_reviews.title: Not ideal for a store. Good for use at home.
customer_reviews.text: Ok for what it is. Much smaller than we anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: The grandkids are using these for indoor play and for ...
customer_reviews.text: The grandkids are using these for indoor play and for help with physical therapy at home. My daughter has mentioned several time how much both her boys (ages 4 and 16 months) are enjoying them.
customer_reviews.author: CoachLucas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are great. Using them for various activities in my puppy class.
customer_reviews.author: CrazK

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love this so much, kids never get tired to play in this soft play. I totally recommend this product. Your not gonna regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Rubylyn Otake

customer_reviews.title: Play time!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my granddaughter's first birthday. She loves playing on them. My daughter-in-law said she plays on them at her daycare too. These block are a great value and are very well made. Now she has her own set for home.
customer_reviews.author: KTeacher

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and fun for kids to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Neil

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a one year old
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for a one year old, and one that he'll use for a few years. They're versatile for various kinds of play, easy to clean and compact enough to store easily.
customer_reviews.author: ElaineD

customer_reviews.title: Great for indoor
customer_reviews.text: My 1-yr-old loves climbing on these. Great for indoor entertainment
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The kids love playing with these toys
customer_reviews.text: The kids love playing with these toys. They also love laying on them to relax. I will need to buy more. ..
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One year old grandson loved it, as did his 4 and 7 year old cousins!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Waite

customer_reviews.title: fun and pretty solid
customer_reviews.text: very fun "tumbling" blocks. Smaller than I expected but good construction. my 2 year old twins have been enjoying them.
customer_reviews.author: jbcmoxie

customer_reviews.title: So fun
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 8 month old for Christmas. He absolutely loves these. He climbs them and pushes them around. The only down side is that they don't stay put.
customer_reviews.author: Zaichek

customer_reviews.title: Fun, soft, large blocks!
customer_reviews.text: My day care children are loving these, I bought two sets. We shall see how they hold up.

customer_reviews.title: Fun and useful
customer_reviews.text: These mats are great. We use them for physical therapy for my 18month old but my older kids love to play and build forts with them too.

customer_reviews.title: Just like he has at daycare
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves these. Just like he has at daycare. Well made. Sturdy.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my grand daughter enjoys playing with them. she is10 months old.

customer_reviews.text: The blocks are firm and sturdy. Colors bright and vibrate. Easy for my 2 year old granddaughter to move and lift.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing my 1 year old and 3 year old love them.

customer_reviews.title: They will play with it and you will be the favorite.  Bonus the cat will love the box it comes in.
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves it, and a smile from your grandchild is worth all the $ in the world.

customer_reviews.title: The kids are enjoying the toys but the cheese slice ...
customer_reviews.text: The kids are enjoying the toys but the cheese slice foam piece came apart at the top and the foam is exposed. So I'm going to call company and hopefully they will replace it without any problem
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like how these are made, kids of all ages love playing with and on these.

customer_reviews.title: Great fun
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loves them! Isn't that all I need to say.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, hours and hours of fun!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure who has more fun with these blocks, me or my son. I wish I had these for my daughters when they were little.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's fun
customer_reviews.text: My 15 month old daughter likes to climb and then slide down, she doesn't use much but when she does she enjoys it.
customer_reviews.author: JFLY

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this toy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter's first birthday and she took to this right away. She loves to climb and bounce on it and just laughs away. It does slide on my carpet and the pieces don't stick together but I think a couple of adhesive velcro patches will do the trick. You can tell just by watching her how much it workes her balance and it's been remarkable how much her balance has improved in only a weekend. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Katie G

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: These blocks were a huge hit with my 18 month old granddaughter. She stacked them up, picked them up and carried them around, climbed on them and tumbled off (all of a foot onto carpet) and came up laughing. They are really perfectly designed, seem sturdy and they give lots of opportunity for creative uses. She was roling things down the slide, making huge towers and knocking them down - all around great toy.
customer_reviews.author: SVOak

customer_reviews.title: versatile and fun. Both my 1 year old and 4 year ...
customer_reviews.text: versatile and fun. Both my 1 year old and 4 year old have played with it daily since Christmas. I paired it with a foam tunnel and it is perfect.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for active baby
customer_reviews.text: For an active one year old, this was a perfect gift. My granddaughter loves it.

customer_reviews.title: The kids love it

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for children building skills and gross motor skills! love it

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect for safely climbing
customer_reviews.text: My child is 9 months old and loves to climb. Very active. These are perfect for safely climbing, rolling around not to mention learning about the shapes and colors. My only concern is that the move if they are on carpet.

customer_reviews.title: So worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Love these!! Bought them for our grandson's 1st birthday. He's a climber so they were perfect! We may have to add bigger ones to his collection next year!

customer_reviews.title: Ssoft blocks review
customer_reviews.text: The boys enjoyed the blocks so much that they were busy building with them for hours. I am going to order more as I can afford them It's my only complaint - the price. I can't order as many as I would like at one time because of the price.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: They were a great price and we have gotten so much use out of them. My son has used them for physical therapy, fort building, stacking, you name it they are so much fun!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Rolph

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best
customer_reviews.text: These blocks are simply the best! The kids climb on them, build with them, push them around. They play with them daily. And then their parents use them for yoga.... wow.
customer_reviews.author: Kathie Olsen

customer_reviews.title: fun
customer_reviews.text: a little smaller than I had imagined, but the imagination is a funny thing the little girl in the house likes them and plays with them alot useful as little tables too

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: My one year old twins love these play forms. I just wish they came with a way to fasten them together (like Velcro).

customer_reviews.title: 11 months & 18 months grandkids love these. The round form is helping for crawling ...
customer_reviews.text: 11 months & 18 months grandkids love these. The round form is helping for crawling around the room. Fun to watch

customer_reviews.title: ... because I remember how much my 19 year old loved them when she was a child
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandchildren because I remember how much my 19 year old loved them when she was a child.

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 15 month old grandson who loves to climb. He loves it! Thank you for such a great product.
customer_reviews.author: edna y carter

customer_reviews.title: excellent toy--bought it for our 1 yr old grandson and ...
customer_reviews.text: excellent toy--bought it for our 1 yr old grandson and our 2 year old grand daughter took them over. Very durable so far. I can see they will both get a lot of use out of them.
customer_reviews.author: dg

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality but the mats are a little smaller than what I expected. Both my 2 year old and 8 month old love them
customer_reviews.author: brooke streeter

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous to climb on
customer_reviews.text: Way too lightweight to be able to climb on. While most are well stitched together, some have wrinkles in the plastic. It gets 2 stars because they are so lightweight that they just slide all over the place, they tip over easily,and are much smaller than the pic indicates. My 1 yr old can't really use them safely. Was a waste of money. I can only hope that when this kid is older,she can jump over them. I didn't give 1 star because they are very nice looking and they are Small enough to store them easily (I was shocked at how small the box was that they were delivered in.
customer_reviews.author: racecardriversr

customer_reviews.title: Easy transactions and quickly delivery
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with product! Kids love it! Fun and therapeutic for all ages! Playtime is a lot of fun now
customer_reviews.author: G. S.

customer_reviews.title: Soft Play Forms
customer_reviews.text: My grandson Peyton loves these blocks. They are light enough he can move them around himself and climb all over them in different arrangements. They are also impromptu seating for other little ones.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E Mailhot

customer_reviews.title: Grandchildren Love Them
customer_reviews.text: Great Item my grandchildren play with them all the time. They are soft and safe! Just wish there was more of them!!
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: They are great. My kids like them and they are safe
customer_reviews.text: They are great. My kids like them and they are safe. The only issue is that you cannot attach together so they come apart easily when my kids play with them.
customer_reviews.author: Chez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hours of fun thanks to these on cold Michigan days
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this purchase. My granddaughter plays on it every day. Would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn Casey

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my granddaughter for Christmas. I expected them to be more like the blocks used in preschools, especially for the price; however, they were smaller than I had imagined they would be.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Strohm

customer_reviews.title: Therapist recommend
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these for our special needs twins to use in our therapy room, our pediatric physical therapist recommend these for balance and climbing. Our twins love to sit, climb, and stack these. These play forms are firm enough for the littles to sit on without sinking in, I also will use them to sit on while playing on the floor with the kids and they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: babynurse

product_meta.title: Constructive Playthings 5 Piece Lightweight Vinyl Soft Play Forms for Toddlers, Toddler Climbing, Crawling, Sliding Toys
product_meta.description: Safely designed for toddlers and babies, these moveable shapes are the building blocks of your own playground. A perfect indoor activity to get the "sillies out," these forms are lightweight enough for toddlers to arrange and rearrange as they play. They're great for expanding minds and growing baby bodies. These soft, vinyl, spatial tools have a long shelf life to provide your family with years of quality use. They're safe to use and, while they make great toys in their own right, can be combined with other toys to make forts and play obstacles to provide hours of fun. Package includes (5) Lightweight Vinyl Soft Play Forms, including Two Blocks, a Ramp, Cylinder, and a Large Half Cylinder. This set is recommended for ages 12 months and up. Made in the USA.
feature_bullets: SOFT PLAY FORMS FOR TODDLERS AND BABIES: A perfect indoor activity to get the “wiggles out,” these forms are lightweight enough for toddlers to arrange and rearrange and are sure to stimulate success and directed adventure
DURABLE CONSTRUCTION: Each piece is made from wipe-clean vinyl and features playful colors to provide years of interactive playtime with your children

5 PIECE INTERACTIVE SET: This set includes a ramp, which measures 24” x 16” x 8” down to 1”, as well as two building blocks, a cylinder, and a large half cylinder to provide an expansive playground for your little one
VERSATILE: Use the toys on their own or combine with other toys to make forts or play obstacles to provide hours of endless fun!
EDUCATIONAL TOY: Great for expanding minds and growing baby bodies learning motor skills and hand-eye coordination

PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS: Package includes (5) Lightweight Vinyl Soft Play Forms, including Two Blocks, a Ramp, Cylinder, and a Large Half Cylinder. Square Block measures 16” x 16" x 8”. Rectangle Block measures 16” x 8” x 8”. Ramp measures 24” x 16” x 8” at the top down to 1” at the bottom. Cylinde measures 16” x 8” x 25”. Half Cylinder measures 16” x 16” x 8”. Recommended for ages 12 months and up. Made in the USA.
